title: (b) For other buildable reservations on lands under slum which are not covered under clause no
clause_text: (b) For other buildable reservations on lands under slum which are not covered under clause no. 7.4(a) above, BUA equal to 25 percent of the area under that reservation in that plot shall be demanded free of cost by the SRA for MCGM or any other appropriate Authority. The BUA of such amenity shall be excluded for the purpose of FSI computation. Thereafter the development for DRA be allowed as per the full permissible FSI of the entire plot according to regulation 33(10) (A) read with this Regulation and subject to provisions in clause No. 7.1
